message.name: ERR_LOCATION_NAME_EXISTS
message.locale: A Location with this name already exists in this structure.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_XRV_LOCATIONTYPE_BLANK
message.locale: You cannot add a location until its location and parent type has been entered in the location relationship hierarchy.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_FV_LOCATIONTYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: The location type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_XRV_LOCATION_ISPARENT
message.locale: You cannot modify this location's type while it exists as a parent location.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_XRV_INVALID_PARENT_TYPE
message.locale: The location type of %1s is not defined as the parent type for Location %2c.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_XRV_ROOT_LOCATION_EXISTS
message.locale: A root location already exists for this location structure.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_XRV_LOCATIONSTRUCTURE_CANCELLED
message.locale: A location cannot be added to a cancelled location structure.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_XRV_MODIFY_LOCATIONSTRUCTURE_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot modify this location as the location structure is cancelled.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_XRV_ADD_LOCATION_TO_CLOSED_PARENTLOCATION
message.locale: A location cannot be added if the parent location is cancelled.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_XRV_CREATE_HOLIDAY_LOCATION_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot create holiday for a cancelled location.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_XRV_CREATE_RESOURCE_LOCATION_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot add a resource to a cancelled location.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_XRV_ASSIGN_RESOURCE_LOCATION_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot assign a resource to a cancelled location.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_XRV_CREATE_SCHEDULE_LOCATION_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot create schedule for a cancelled location.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_XRV_ASSIGN_LOCATION_ACCESS_LOCATION_CANCELLED
message.locale: The user cannot assign additional location access from a cancelled location.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_XFV_SPECIFY_SEARCH_CRITERIA
message.locale: You must specify some search criteria.

message.name: INF_LOCATION_NO_MATCH_FOUND
message.locale: No records matched the criteria specified.
